title: Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment plans to onboard small companies to expand base
description: The Fintech Association for Consumer Empowerment (FACE) aims to include smaller companies to enhance its representation and effectiveness. Recognized by the Reserve Bank of India as a Self-Regulatory Organisation, FACE plans to expand its membership, set up committees, and work on a fraud repository in collaboration with various authorities.
